name: British Airways 787-8 Dreamliner [G-ZBJC] INAUGURAL Landing in Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
After several months of waiting, and numerous delays, the British Airways 787 has finally touched down in YYC. Calgary International Airport now officially has a daily 787 flight. This aircraft will bring a brand new level of comfort to the passengers on British Airways flights 103 and 102. Right at the end of the video, listen to all the spotters cheering and applauding :)

The video features the aircraft approaching and touching down on YYC's Runway 17L, and then features a close up shot of the aircraft taxiing into the gate. I must say, the lighting in the video is quite spectacular. The 787 already looks beautiful, but it looks even better in the last light of the day. Fun fact: I saw this plane on the flightline when I went to Paine Field last year! I hope you guys enjoy the video as much as I did filming it :)

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: British Airways (BAW/BA)
Aircraft: Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner
Aircraft Name: None
Engines: 2x RR Trent 1000
Registration: G-ZBJC
Route: LHR-YYC
Callsign: Speedbird 103
Runway used: 17L
Taxiway(s) used: D3, J, C
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/GZBJC
